DOC.brief_title: Lipid Profile Patients With Severe Sepsis Septic Shock Under Strict Liberal Glycemic Control
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator enrol 69 consecutive patient severe sepsis septic shock divide two different group randomization seal envelope . One group call intensive glycemic control glycemic level 80 110 mg/dl exogenous insulin . The group call conventional glycemic control glycemic level 180 220 mg/dl . Blood sample collect 0 , 12 , 24 , 48 72 hour measure HDL , LDL , Total cholesterol , free fatty acid oxidize LDL . Clinical data creatinine , P/F ratio , bilirubin , platelet , lactate , arterial blood gasometry either monitor .
